other_tests.findings: The first cycle resulted in 12 available embryos, with 1 mutation-free embryo transferred without clinical pregnancy. The second cycle had 10 embryos available for analysis, with only 1 embryo failing to amplify, resulting in the identification of mutation-free embryos.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The second cycle of testing showed improved outcomes with the identification of more viable mutation-free embryos leading to a successful pregnancy.

other_tests.findings: Confirmation of mutation-free status of the fetus.
DNA analysis followed up on embryos confirmed the results of preimplantation genetic diagnosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Consistent identification of mutation status across multiple analyses.

other_tests.findings: Normal chromosomal analysis of peripheral-blood lymphocytes from the affected child and the parents.
Identified mosaicism for the SHH mutation in the father.
